1047654633743818753.text: @pmylund of @GrowClovyr attempts to make sense of "web3", "Dapp", "dweb" and other confusing terms of the trade.  How do we ensure that #web3 isn't another "Linux on the desktop" moment?pic.twitter.com/Djdg3vVgi2

1047648965276172288.text: #GeneralizedMining is "the third-party economy": we went from two roles (users and miners in Bitcoin) to as many as seven (@LivepeerOrg, see image) which add value and provide services to the network. What opportunities are there here for funds?pic.twitter.com/gu3suqTvse

1047646457338191872.text: @jbrukh, @coinfund_io founder, introduces #GeneralizedMining: "If you believe Bitcoin will be the only blockchain this talk is not for you. If you believe in the @polkadotnetwork vision this talk is very much for you."pic.twitter.com/qpIOYf5HR7
